metadata.name: Yondelis 0 25 MG Injection powder for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in alzheimer s disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: CAD106 can block the formation of beta amyloid plaques in the brain Since the formation of such plaques is considered a hallmark of the disease CAD106 may offer the potential to advance the treatment of Alzheimer s disease
